import style from './create.module.css' import { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; //import validation from '../validation/Validation.js'; const Create = ({}) => { const [selectedGenres, setSelectedGenres] = useState(''); const [selectedPlatforms, setSelectedPlatforms] = useState(''); const [vgName, setVgName] = useState(''); const [vgDescription, setVgDescription] = useState(''); const [vgimage, setVgimage] = useState(''); const [vgRelease, setVgRelease] = useState(''); const [vgRating, setVgRating]= useState(''); {/***********************************************/} const handleSelectedGenresChange=(event)=>{ setSelectedGenres(event.target.value); } {/***********************************************/} const handleSelectedPlatformsChange=(event)=>{ setSelectedPlatforms(event.target.value); } {/***********************************************/} const handleVgNameChange=(event)=>{ setVgName(event.target.value); } {/***********************************************/} const handleVgDescriptionChange=(event)=>{ setVgDescription(event.target.value); } {/***********************************************/} const handleVgimageChange=(event)=>{ setVgimage(event.target.value); } {/***********************************************/} const handleVgReleaseChange=(event)=>{ setVgRelease(event.target.value); } {/***********************************************/} const handleVgRatingChange=(event)=>{ setVgRating(event.target.value); } {/***********************************************/} return(
